definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The invention relates to a dolomite glass and a manufacturing method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种白云石玻璃及其制作方法。

sentences.english: Proper dolomite application significantly increased rapeseed yield in the acidic yellow-red soil.
sentences.chinese: 适当施用白云石粉能够极显著提高油菜产量。

sentences.english: Commonly the dolomite crystals form a framework with evenly distributed porosity.
sentences.chinese: 通常白云石晶体构成格架，它有均匀分布的孔隙。

sentences.english: The commonly used fluxes are limestone and dolomite.
sentences.chinese: 常用的熔剂有石灰石和白云石。

sentences.english: Dolomite is the main material of magnesium products.
sentences.chinese: 镁制品生产的主要原料为白云石。

sentences.english: The new comprehensive utilization technology of phosphatic dolomite is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了含磷白云石的综合利用新工艺。

sentences.english: The ladle lining with tar dolomite is common in German and in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 用焦油白云石做包衬，在德国及欧洲其它国家很普及。
